mods.note: COCOAMJT PALMS A 2-$ year old palm in the Sultan’s garden at Hamran. A Palm grove on the seashore at Salalah. In the right foreground can be seen a drying ground covered with sardines.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of a Palm Tree at Hamran

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 86 x 138mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of a two-and-a-half-year-old palm tree, in the Sultan of Muscat and Oman's [Sa‘īd bin Taymūr Āl Bū Sa‘īd] garden at Hamran, Dhofar, in the Sultanate of Muscat and Oman.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
